item.description: About Me こんにちは、私はパトリック・オラジド「篠宮」です。Kuti .: Jp :: uk :: nigeria： エンジニア、創始者、リラクゼーション・ゲーマー＆メー

About Me Hi, I’m Patrick Olajide “Shinomiya” Kuti. 🇬🇧 🇯🇵 🇳🇬 I enjoy learning new things, crafting solutions for complex problems, and creating tech to solve social issues. Currently speak Japanese and English and am learning Igbo, German and Korean. Experienced in developing, deploying, scaling, administering and securing large-scale web applications and teams whilst possessing a broad knowledge of various system architectures and design. Currently working magic at ExaWizards and omnirai.
